remarks: Negation in a product of groups.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
prdsgrpd.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsgrpd.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdsgrpd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsgrpd.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Grp ) $.
prdsinvgd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdsinvgd.n $e |- N = ( invg ` Y ) $.
prdsinvgd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
prdsinvgd $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` X ) = ( x e. I |-> ( ( invg ` ( R ` x ) ) ` ( X ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
